sentences.en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentences.cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentences.en: A special dispensation may be obtained from the domestic union concerned.
sentences.cn: 从国内相关的工会那儿或许能得到一项特许。

sentences.en: Fire may have breached the cargo tanks and set the oil ablaze.
sentences.cn: 大火当时有可能把货船上的油罐烧漏了，从而引燃原油。

sentences.en: I may be back next year.
sentences.cn: 我可能明年回来。

sentences.en: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.cn: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.cn: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.en: Like the best stories, this one may yet have a happy end.
sentences.cn: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

sentences.en: Mr. Hobbs? May we come in?
sentences.cn: 霍布斯先生？我们可以进去吗？

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: Now, erm, obviously some of our listeners may have some ideas.
sentences.cn: 嗯，对了，显然我们的一些听众可能会有些想法。

sentences.en: Sightseers may be a little overwhelmed by the crowds and noise.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的人群和喧闹的噪音可能会让游客有些茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.cn: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentences.cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentences.en: The desire to be a mother may creep up on you unexpectedly.
sentences.cn: 你会不知不觉地产生想当母亲的渴望。

sentences.en: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.cn: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.en: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.cn: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.en: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable.
sentences.cn: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

sentences.en: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.cn: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.en: They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

sentences.en: This may help to undermine the brittle truce that currently exists.
sentences.cn: 这也许会火上浇油，破坏当前脆弱不稳的休战局面。

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: We may have some rain today.
sentences.cn: 今天可能会下点雨。

sentences.en: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.cn: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

sentences.en: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.cn: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.en: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.cn: 你可能会觉得自己不值得别人关心和帮助。

sentences.en: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.cn: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

words.tran_cn: 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该

phrases.tran_cn: 同 might as well （参见 might）
要我帮忙吗；请问买什么（商场用语）
但愿如此（《魔戒首部曲》主题曲）
n. 五月皇后（被选为五朔节庆祝活动女王的少女）
很可能；充分理由；有充分理由可以…
这很难说；事情未必会这样（暗示所考虑的事情并不重要）
飞越来生缘；美梦成真（电影名称）

trans.tran_en: to indicate that something will possibly happen or be true in the future, but you cannot be certain
if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

trans.tran_cn: [May]五月，山楂属植物，（五朔节装饰用的）绿枝花枝，（春天开花的）绣线菊属植物
trans.tran_en: the white or pink flowers of the  hawthorn
if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain
You use may to indicate that something will possibly happen or be true in the future, but you cannot be certain
